strapiPost.title: Noon2Moon Endurance MTB Race Returns To Coler
strapiPost.content:
Noon2Moon, Coler Mountain Bike Preserve’s Second Annual endurance race, returns to Bentonville on Saturday, May 6, with the 12-hr race beginning at 8a and the 6-hr race at 12p. 

  • Til the sun sets: Riders can race solo or as a team, and those who complete the most laps in their category will be awarded prizes and medals. The community is invited to cheer the riders on (or heckle them), and cowbells and costumes are highly encouraged! 
  • In the biking business: Join this year’s new Corporate Challenge and race with your business teammates against other local companies for bragging rights while giving back; proceeds from the event support Coler Mountain Bike Preserve’s trails and community programs. 

Register to race solo or as a team here.
